hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
cd /home/jenkins/output/ git clone https://github.com/technexion-android/Documents.git -b android-9 cd -
cd ${HOME} mkdir -p test cd test repo init -u https://github.com/technexion-android/manifest -b tn-p9.0.0_2.0.1_8m-ga_tn1.0 --depth 1 repo sync --force-sync -j16
# hdmi sed -i 's/DRAM_SIZE_1G=false/DRAM_SIZE_1G=true/' cookers/env.bash source cookers/env.bash.imx8.pico-imx8m.pi.hdmi merge_restricted_extras
########################################################### # # # EDM-IMX8M # # # ###########################################################
# mipi panel sed -i 's/DRAM_SIZE_1G=false/DRAM_SIZE_1G=true/' cookers/env.bash source cookers/env.bash.imx8.edm-imx8m.wizard.hdmi
## WIFI ENABLED cp /home/jenkins/output/qca9377-3_firmware_20180927.zip . unzip qca9377-3_firmware_20180927.zip mkdir -p device/fsl/imx8m/edm_imx8m/wifi-firmware mv qca9377-3_firmware_20180927-1/QCA9377 device/fsl/imx8m/edm_imx8m/wifi-firmware/
rm -rf qca9377-3_firmware_20180927-1/ rm -rf qca9377-3_firmware_20180927.zip
## BT ENABLED cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/nvm_tlv_3.2.bin device/fsl/imx8m/edm_imx8m/bluetooth/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/rampatch_tlv_3.2.tlv device/fsl/imx8m/edm_imx8m/bluetooth/
# hdmi throw
# ili9881c with voice-hat source cookers/env.bash.imx8.edm-imx8m.wizard.mipi-dsi_ili9881c-voicehat cook -j12
release_date=$(date "+%Y%m%d") gen_mp_images cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/txt/README.txt auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_Release-Note_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_User-Manual_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/libusb-1.0.dll auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/uuu auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/uuu.exe auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/UUU.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/zadig-2.4.exe auto_test/ mv auto_test edm-imx8m_wizard_android-9.0.0-2.0.1_QCA9377_mipi-dsi-ili9881c-1280x720_voice-hat_"$release_date" zip -R -9 edm-imx8m_wizard_android-9.0.0-2.0.1_QCA9377_mipi-dsi-ili9881c-1280x720_voice-hat_"$release_date".zip edm-imx8m_wizard_android-9.0.0-2.0.1_QCA9377_mipi-dsi-ili9881c-1280x720_voice-hat_"$release_date"/* cp edm-imx8m_wizard_android-9.0.0-2.0.1_QCA9377_mipi-dsi-ili9881c-1280x720_voice-hat_"$release_date".zip /home/jenkins/output/ rm -rf edm-imx8m_wizard_android-9.0.0-2.0.1_QCA9377_mipi-dsi-ili9881c-1280x720_voice-hat_"$release_date"
sync rm -rf /home/jenkins/output/Documents
#su jenkins #git config --global user.email "you@example.com" #git config --global user.name "Your Name" #cd ../ #mkdir technexion-imx8_android-9.0.0-1.0.0_fullsource_20190401 #cd technexion-imx8_android-9.0.0-1.0.0_fullsource_20190401 #repo init -u https://github.com/technexion-android/manifest -b tn-p9.0.0_1.0.0_8m-ga #repo sync --force-sync -j12 #rm -rf .repo/project-objects/*.git #cd - #tar Jcvf technexion-imx8_android-8.1.0_fullsource_20180919.tar.xz technexion-imx8_android-9.0.0-1.0.0_fullsource_20190401 #sync
#mv technexion-imx8_android-8.1.0_fullsource_20180919.tar.xz /home/jenkins/output/
#source cookers/env.bash.imx8.pico-8m.pi.lcd #cook -j4
#gen_mp_images #zip -r "$release_date"_auto_images_lcd.zip auto_test #mv "$release_date"_auto_images_lcd.zip /home/jenkins/output/ #rm -rf auto_test
#dd if=/dev/zero of="$release_date"_emmc_16G_lcd.img bs=13M count=1024 #kpartx -av "$release_date"_emmc_16G_lcd.img
#loop_dev=$(losetup | grep "emmc_16G_lcd.img" | awk '{print $1}')
#echo "mounted ${loop_dev}"
#(echo n; echo p; echo 1; echo; echo; echo w;) | fdisk ${loop_dev} #sync #flashcard ${loop_dev} #sync #kpartx -d ${loop_dev} #losetup -d ${loop_dev} #sync #mv "$release_date"_emmc_16G_lcd.img /home/jenkins/output/ #sync
